results.name: Number of divisors of n of the form 2^k + 1 for k >= 0.
comment: a(n) is the number of terms of A000051 that divide n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
mathematica: Table[DivisorSum[n, 1 &, IntegerQ@ Log2[# - 1] &], {n, 105}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jun 11 2018 *)
xref: Cf. A000051, A209229, A292315 (positions of zeros), A305435.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 11 2018
